mapper.select: select rownum as row_num, idea.* from (select p.*,u_name from post_info p, user_info u where p.u_email=u.u_email and p.post_kind='idea' order by post_dt) idea where rownum between 1+(#{n}-1)*10 and #{n}*10 order by row_num desc
select * from (select rownum as row_num, post_info.* from post_info where post_kind='idea' order by row_num desc)
mapper.update: update post_info set cnt = cnt+1 where post_seq = #{post_seq}
